body: @AngryTentacles This is manga not doujin you cocksucker retard

agree with @HotSauce, anyway Mind Corruption or just plain Corruption which is always together with the tag Mind Break, Mind Control, Moral Degeneration and lastly the most infamous tags NTR and Tentacles.. sad that it's rare to find this kind of doujins now a days.
I hate it when porn has more plot than the majority of seasonal anime.
